description: The main road connecting our village to Allahabad city is completely broken. Ambulances struggle to reach patients, and we have no other alternative route. People have started protesting due to this persistent problem.

As a taxi driver in Firozabad, my car’s suspension is completely damaged due to these bad roads. I’ve already spent thousands on repairs, but the roads are still the same. The local authorities visited once but didn't resolve the issue.

We haven't had running water in Muzaffarnagar for the past three days! We are forced to buy water from private tankers at a high cost. Why is no action being taken? The local news channel even covered this issue, yet no action.

Chain snatching is increasing in Lucknow. My mother was robbed in broad daylight outside a crowded market! The police took the complaint but haven't taken any action. Children and elderly people are severely affected due to this issue.

In Allahabad, we have constant voltage fluctuations. My refrigerator and TV got damaged due to this, and no one from the electricity board is responding to our complaints. Other residents in my locality are also facing similar issues.

As a contractor in Saharanpur, I lost a project bid because the official favored another bidder who paid him off. Corruption is ruining opportunities for honest people! We demand an immediate resolution before things get worse.

As a college student in Varanasi, I struggle daily because of irregular metro services. We are forced to take expensive auto-rickshaws instead. Children and elderly people are severely affected due to this issue.

We haven't had running water in Varanasi for the past three days! We are forced to buy water from private tankers at a high cost. Why is no action being taken? Despite multiple complaints, no action has been taken.

In Bareilly, water supply is irregular. Sometimes we get water at midnight, sometimes not at all. People are waking up at odd hours just to fill buckets. We demand an immediate resolution before things get worse.

As a taxi driver in Bareilly, my car’s suspension is completely damaged due to these bad roads. I’ve already spent thousands on repairs, but the roads are still the same. Despite multiple complaints, no action has been taken.

We haven't had running water in Moradabad for the past three days! We are forced to buy water from private tankers at a high cost. Why is no action being taken? Even after assurances from the authorities, nothing has changed.

I missed an important job interview because the bus from Mathura to the city was canceled last minute. We need better transport reliability! The situation is worsening each day, and we need urgent help.

In Ghaziabad, we have constant voltage fluctuations. My refrigerator and TV got damaged due to this, and no one from the electricity board is responding to our complaints. The situation is worsening each day, and we need urgent help.
There have been multiple thefts in our colony in Rampur in the last month. People are scared, and yet there is no police patrolling. We demand an immediate resolution before things get worse.

As a college student in Saharanpur, I struggle daily because of irregular metro services. We are forced to take expensive auto-rickshaws instead. The local authorities visited once but didn't resolve the issue.

The main road connecting our village to Bareilly city is completely broken. Ambulances struggle to reach patients, and we have no other alternative route. The local news channel even covered this issue, yet no action.

Public buses in Gorakhpur are always overcrowded. As a woman, I feel unsafe traveling during peak hours. Why can’t there be more frequent buses? Other residents in my locality are also facing similar issues.

I live in Muzaffarnagar, and the power cuts here are unbearable! We barely get electricity for 6-7 hours a day. How are students supposed to study or people supposed to work from home? Children and elderly people are severely affected due to this issue.

I am a resident of Lucknow, and the tap water here is yellowish and smells awful. My children have fallen sick multiple times due to this contamination. Despite multiple complaints, no action has been taken.

I live in Firozabad, and the power cuts here are unbearable! We barely get electricity for 6-7 hours a day. How are students supposed to study or people supposed to work from home? The local news channel even covered this issue, yet no action.

In Faizabad, government ration shops are engaging in fraud. Despite my eligibility, I am denied food grains unless I ‘tip’ the shopkeeper. Children and elderly people are severely affected due to this issue.

We haven't had running water in Basti for the past three days! We are forced to buy water from private tankers at a high cost. Why is no action being taken? Other residents in my locality are also facing similar issues.

I missed an important job interview because the bus from Rampur to the city was canceled last minute. We need better transport reliability! Even after assurances from the authorities, nothing has changed.

The main road connecting our village to Allahabad city is completely broken. Ambulances struggle to reach patients, and we have no other alternative route. Despite multiple complaints, no action has been taken.

I missed an important job interview because the bus from Ghaziabad to the city was canceled last minute. We need better transport reliability! The local news channel even covered this issue, yet no action.
There have been multiple thefts in our colony in Lucknow in the last month. People are scared, and yet there is no police patrolling. We demand an immediate resolution before things get worse.

The main road connecting our village to Muzaffarnagar city is completely broken. Ambulances struggle to reach patients, and we have no other alternative route. Even after assurances from the authorities, nothing has changed.

In Meerut, we have constant voltage fluctuations. My refrigerator and TV got damaged due to this, and no one from the electricity board is responding to our complaints. People have started protesting due to this persistent problem.

In Basti, government ration shops are engaging in fraud. Despite my eligibility, I am denied food grains unless I ‘tip’ the shopkeeper. We demand an immediate resolution before things get worse.

There have been multiple thefts in our colony in Noida in the last month. People are scared, and yet there is no police patrolling. Children and elderly people are severely affected due to this issue.

As a college student in Gorakhpur, I struggle daily because of irregular metro services. We are forced to take expensive auto-rickshaws instead. Other residents in my locality are also facing similar issues.

In Mathura, water supply is irregular. Sometimes we get water at midnight, sometimes not at all. People are waking up at odd hours just to fill buckets. The situation is worsening each day, and we need urgent help.

As a taxi driver in Agra, my car’s suspension is completely damaged due to these bad roads. I’ve already spent thousands on repairs, but the roads are still the same. This problem has been ongoing for months with no proper solution.

I had to pay a bribe of ₹2000 to get my land documents processed in Basti. Why should honest citizens have to pay extra just to get their rights? We demand an immediate resolution before things get worse.

I am a resident of Gorakhpur, and the tap water here is yellowish and smells awful. My children have fallen sick multiple times due to this contamination. The local authorities visited once but didn't resolve the issue.
